data.question: What is the empirical formula of compound 1?
What method was used to record the thermal gravimetric analysis (TGA) data?
data.answer: TGA data were recorded on a TGA-Perkin Elmer TGA 7 analyzer.

data.question: What is the yield percentage of the preparation of {[Cd6Ag4(SPh)16](bpe)2}n (2)?
True or False: The solvents were degassed after being purified by conventional methods.
What is the crystal system of compound 2?
True or False: The photocatalytic activities of 1 and 2 were evaluated under UV light illumination.
What was the light source used for photocatalysis measurement?
data.answer: A 500 W Xenon lamp was used as a light source.

data.question: True or False: The microporous framework 2 showed less absorption in the visible range compared to cluster 1.
What was the concentration of RhB in the aqueous solution used for photocatalysis testing?
True or False: The largest peak in the final difference map of compound 1 was in the vicinity of a silver atom.
What was the temperature at which the sample was degassed before CO2 adsorption isotherm measurement?
True or False: The crystal color of compound 1 is yellow.
What is the reason for the red shift in the absorption spectrum of the microporous framework 2?
data.answer: The red shift is interpreted as a combined effect that arose from the proximity of the clusters and their interlinking by bpe.

data.question: True or False: The photocatalytic performance of the microporous framework 2 is inferior to that of cluster 1.
What was the specific surface area (SBET) of the microporous framework 2?
data.answer: 186 m2 g-1 at 1 atm and 273 K

data.question: True or False: The microporous framework 2 could adsorb CO2 at 11.95 cm3 g-1.
What was the crystal system of compound 1?
True or False: The microporous framework 2 was synthesized by reacting Cd(SPh)2 and AgNO3 in a solution of DMF.
What was the method used for X-ray crystallography data collection?
data.answer: Data were measured using ω scans of 0.5° per frame.

data.question: How was the porosity of the microporous framework 2 determined?
